ctx: intros F PF f x y Fx Fy.
exceptions.tactic: assert (Hxy: locally x (fun x' => norm (x' - y) < norm (x - y))) by (exists posreal1; intros z Hz; destruct (locally y (fun y' => norm (y' - x) < norm (x - y)) Fy) as [eps Hy]; exists (Rmin eps posreal1); intros u Hu; apply norm_lt; apply Rmin_case_strong; [apply (Hy u (ball_le_to_ball_lt Hu)) | apply Hz]).
exceptions.exn: The reference norm was not found in the current environment.

original: intros F PF f x y Fx Fy. assert (Hxy: locally x (fun x' => norm (x' - y) < norm (x - y))) by (exists posreal1; intros z Hz; destruct (locally y (fun y' => norm (y' - x) < norm (x - y)) Fy) as [eps Hy]; exists (Rmin eps posreal1); intros u Hu; apply norm_lt; apply Rmin_case_strong; [apply (Hy u (ball_le_to_ball_lt Hu)) | apply Hz]). contradiction (filter_not_empty PF). apply Fx. exists posreal1; intros z Hz. simpl. unfold ball in *. apply not_lt. rewrite Rabs_left1. - rewrite (norm_minus_comm y x) in Hz; auto. - apply norm_neg.
